alert.note: Alert for Braxton; Clay; Nicholas (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 2:29PM EDT until July 13 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Nicholas County in southeastern West Virginia... Southwestern Braxton County in north central West Virginia... Northeastern Clay County in north central West Virginia... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 229 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Big Otter, or 10 miles northeast of Clay, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Birch River, Harrison, Widen, Little Birch, Strange Creek and Servia. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 46 and 47, and between mile markers 49 and 59. Route 19 between mile markers 52 and 68. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
